title: Council Decision of 9 November 1998 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 9 November 1998 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training (98/C 346/02)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Decision 75/364/EEC of 16 June 1975 setting up an Advisory Committee on Medical Training (1), and in particular Articles 3 and 4 thereof,
Whereas, by its Decision of 29 June 1998 (2), the Council appointed Mr Steen POULSEN a member of the Committee for the period ending 28 June 2001;
Whereas the Danish Government has nominated Ms Runa STURLASSON to replace Mr Steen POULSEN,
main_body: Ms Runa STURLASSON is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training in place of Mr Steen POULSEN for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 28 June 2001.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 November 1998.
For the Council
The President
J. FARNLEITNER
(1) OJ L 167, 30.6.1975, p. 17.
(2) OJ C 222, 16.7.1998, p. 3.
